actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain lands within Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks, in the State of California.

summary.text: Designates as wilderness specified lands comprising approximately 722,000 acres within Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks, in the State of California. Provides that such wilderness shall be known as the "Sequoia-Kings Canyon Wilderness".

titles.title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain lands within Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks, in the State of California.
